pages.text: $(bred)Jack-In-Box Zombie$() always shivers, not because he's cold but because he's crazy.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)40$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : enemy will make them so excited that cause jack box $(bred)explode$() in a random time, which will $(l)cause highly damage to creatures in 5 blocks$().
